thumb.title: seu barrriga leva vassourada do chaves e imita foca
thumb.description: In the past, there was no plastic surgery and almost no cosmetic products, and people were happier, even though there weren't many cosmetic procedures like there are today. It's true that a person has to accept themselves as they are. I see many people who are never satisfied with their appearance, even after having several plastic surgeries, and many die in the name of aesthetic beauty. I believe that body part surgery is rare, because I observe that most people are completely normal when it comes to their physical appearance. In most cases, a person does it to beautify themselves. There are people who sink into hidden debts because of excessive vanity. I believe that it is even a form of selfishness when you use your money for aesthetic reasons. You are afraid of taking the COVID vaccine thinking that you will have a heart attack, but you take the vaccine to get Botox without fear, even knowing that many people die, you hypocrite!bandido bom é bandido mortoaxpiorrackgeração raiz covarde e imunda viva a geração nutellalentamente um guisado para escapar de lento
